name: Wacky Weeds
description:
Your garden is becoming overcrowded with weeds, they are popping up everywhere! Quickly destroy them all before your garden becomes a complete mess. But be careful, some of the weeds have mutated and are fighting back. Watch out for Rachel the Robin too.

W/A/S/D to move and SPACE to kill the weeds when you are near them. Good Luck!

Wacky weeds was made in the Godot Wild Jam #36 over the course 12 days. The theme was uncontrollable growth and I thought of weeds almost immediately and thus Wacky Weeds was born.

This is an endless game and the target is to get the highest score possible. Don't worry though, your high score will be saved even if you close the game.

I incorporated the wildcard, Competitive Spirit, by making a high score system whereby players can compare their scores and compete against each other.

Thanks to Philip Schutte for making the music for the Game - Check out his channel
